LanguageData.RC2_ShroomsHigh.stages.0.label: low shrooms trip
LanguageData.RC2_ShroomsHigh.stages.1.label: moderate shrooms trip
LanguageData.RC2_ShroomsHigh.stages.1.description: I can hear colors and see sounds! Wooooooaaaaaaaah!
LanguageData.RC2_ShroomsHigh.stages.2.label: deep shrooms trip
LanguageData.RC2_ShroomsHigh.stages.2.description: WHAT IS REALITY? WHO IS REALITY? WHY IS REALITY? I'M TRIPPIN' BALLS MAN!
LanguageData.RC2_ShroomsWithdrawal.stages.1.label: Shrooms withdrawal
LanguageData.RC2_ShroomsWithdrawal.stages.1.descripti: What? These aren't addictive silly! How'd the fuck you manage to get yourself addicted?!
